game_summary: In this survival sandbox game set on Arrakis, players explore the desert, harvest spice, craft gear and vehicles, build shelters, manage water, and face hostile forces. The goal is to survive, expand your base, and thrive amid sandstorms, rival factions, and monstrous sandworms.

A Dart for Every Man.how_to_obtain: Schematic costs 40 Intel Points, requires Intel Spent: 1200

Abulurd's Rapture.usage: Sidearm, disruptor modified for doubleshots of heavy darts
Abulurd's Rapture.how_to_obtain: Schematic costs 20 Intel Points, requires Intel Spent: 300

Adept Burst Drillshot.how_to_obtain: Schematic costs 30 Intel Points, requires Intel Spent: 700

Adept Dirk.how_to_obtain: Schematic costs 30 Intel Points, requires Intel Spent: 700

Advanced Machinery.usage: Vehicle module crafting, plastanium tier crafting
Advanced Machinery.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Advanced Servoks.usage: Fabrication component for vehicles like Sandbikes

Agave Seeds.usage: Fruits contain seeds for various purposes

Aluminum Ingot.usage: Refined from ore, used for products

Aren's Light Armor Boots.usage: Part of Aren's Light Armor set

Aren's Light Armor Chestpiece.usage: Part of Aren's Light Armor set

Aren's Light Armor Gloves.usage: Part of Aren's Light Armor set

Aren's Light Armor Mask.usage: Part of Aren's Light Armor set

Aren's Light Armor Pants.usage: Part of Aren's Light Armor set

Ari's Pistol.usage: Special Maula Pistol, increases accuracy while Prescient

Armor Plating.how_to_obtain: Liberated from those using heavy armor, repurposed

Artisan Disruptor M11.usage: Sidearm, fires darts to penetrate Holtzman Shields
Artisan Disruptor M11.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 9x Steel Ingot, 8x Mechanical Parts, 7x Silicone Block, 11x Gun Parts

Artisan Disruptor Pistol.usage: Sidearm, heavy pistol with shield-destabilizing darts

Artisan Maula Pistol.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 6x Steel Ingot, 14x Mechanical Parts, 5x Silicone Block, 11x Gun Parts

Artisan Rafiq Snubnose.crafting_materials: 70x Water, 8x Steel Ingot, 15x Mechanical Parts, 5x Silicone Block, 11x Gun Parts

Assault Ornithopter Cabin Mk5.usage: Part for Assault Ornithopter, for traversal and combat
Assault Ornithopter Cabin Mk5.how_to_obtain: Crafted via Vehicle Fabricator, blueprint unlocked with Intel Points

Assault Ornithopter Rocket Launcher Mk6.usage: Advanced rocket launcher for Assault Ornithopter

Atmospheric Filtered Fabric.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Ballistic Weave Fabric.usage: Light armor crafting, plastanium tier crafting
Ballistic Weave Fabric.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Bio Components.usage: Organic tech material needed for Fremen and ecological tech recipes
Bio Components.how_to_obtain: Harvested from desert flora or obtained from trader caravans

Blade Parts.how_to_obtain: Found on bodies of blade users or in their storage lockers

Blood Bags.usage: Extracted from enemies, turned into water

Caladan Palace Building Set.usage: Building pieces and placeables from the 2021 film

Calibrated Servok.usage: Specialist servoks for various uses, repurposed for cutterays

Carbide Blade Parts.usage: Melee weapon crafting, plastanium tier crafting
Carbide Blade Parts.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Carbon Ore.usage: Mined, processed with iron for steel

Complex Machinery.usage: Cannot be easily replicated, components from older machines
Complex Machinery.how_to_obtain: Found in older fabricators and refineries

Cope.how_to_obtain: Schematic costs 30 Intel Points, requires Intel Spent: 700

Detox Pack.usage: Removes poison, heatstroke, or spice addiction buildup
Detox Pack.how_to_obtain: Crafted using herbs and chemicals from vendor recipes
Detox Pack.impact_on_progression: Supports health management for sustained exploration

Dewreaper.usage: Collects moisture during night cycles to replenish personal water reserves
Dewreaper.how_to_obtain: Crafted from blueprint unlocked through survival progression tree

Diamodine Blade Parts.usage: Melee weapon crafting, plastanium tier crafting
Diamodine Blade Parts.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Dune 2021 Film Stillsuit.usage: Stillsuit from the film, provides environmental protection

Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Fluted Heavy Caliber Compressor.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Fluted Light Caliber Compressor.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Fortresses.crafting_materials: 320x Granite Stone, 120x Steel Ingot, 40x Polymers, 12x Armor Plating

Fuel Cell.usage: Powers bases, refined into vehicle fuel

Gun Parts.usage: Key components for standard ranged weapons
Gun Parts.how_to_obtain: Salvaged from bodies of ranged weapon users

Healkit.usage: Standardized pack of cleansing agents, dermastraps and chemical stimulants to heal injuries

Heavy Darts.usage: For use in larger and more powerful weapons, pierces armor

Hollower Stillsuit Boots.usage: Part of Hollower Stillsuit set for desert survival

Holtzman Actuator.how_to_obtain: Found in caches by users of suspensor belts
Holtzman Actuator.locations: Places only reachable by suspensor belt users

Holtzman Amplifier.usage: The machine seems to be in a useable state, at least to your untrained eye. What exactly it does is a complete mystery to you.

Hunter-Seeker.usage: One-time-use stealth projectile for assassinating NPC targets or disabling turrets
Hunter-Seeker.how_to_obtain: Rare loot from elite Sardaukar patrols

Hydraulic Piston.how_to_obtain: Forcibly wrested from Great Houses' control

Improved Holtzman Actuator.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Improved Watertube.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Incendiary Gel.usage: Few weapons inspire the type of fear created by fire. Use this ammunition in conjunction with incendiary weapons to instill maximum terror in your adversaries.

Insulated Fabric.how_to_obtain: Part of O'odham cottage industry before displacement

Iodine Pill.usage: Shortens the time required for radiation breakdown within the body and further shields the body from exposure to radiological exposure when used with a radiation suit.

Irradiated Core.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Light Darts.usage: When Holtzman shields were introduced the use of lasguns became too dangerous and subsequently, the use of dart projectiles became the standard ammunition of House Troops and other military forces.

Melange Spiced Beer.usage: The spice melange extends life, expands consciousness and allows the mysterious navigators of the spacing guild to guide heighliners safely between the stars. This food is seasoned with spice melange and will raise the amount of spice in your blood.

Melange Spiced Coffee.usage: Spiced drink, raises spice in blood

Melange Spiced Food.usage: Spiced food, raises spice in blood

Melange Spiced Liquor.usage: Spiced drink, raises spice in blood

Melange Spiced Wine.usage: Spiced drink, raises spice in blood

Missile.usage: A missile projectile that is typically utilized by infantry missile launchers.

Plasteel Plating.how_to_obtain: Found in Deep Desert, obtained from Landsraad rewards, crafted in Advanced Survival Fabricator

Polymers.usage: Used in the fabrication of armor and advanced gear parts
Polymers.how_to_obtain: Processing from salvage or found in industrial ruins

Refined Spice.usage: Purified spice used in alchemical and augmentation crafting recipes
Refined Spice.how_to_obtain: Crafted using a Spice Sampler and refinery station

Repair Gel.usage: Instantly restores durability of worn gear or vehicle modules
Repair Gel.how_to_obtain: Crafted using polymers and electronics scrap

Respawn Beacon.usage: Placing this device in an appropriate place adds a site at which your character can be respawned. Only one beacon can be active at a time. Placing a new beacon will replace the existing one.

Rocket.usage: A rocket projectile with an explosive warhead and a propellant for extra thrust. Typically utilized by vehicular rocket launchers.

Sapho Juice.usage: Drink to reduce the time it takes to activate mentat vision abilities.

Sardaukar Bator Armor.usage: Menacing armor worn by the elite military force, Sardaukar, protective gear with combat utility

Shigawire Claw.usage: A utility gadget for vertical traversal of cliffs or canyon walls, Trooper launcher for traversal or combat
Shigawire Claw.how_to_obtain: Purchased from a Fremen vendor or looted in caves

Sinkcharts.usage: Unlock recipes, found in Deep Desert

Spice.usage: Consumed for abilities, found in spice fields

Spice Infusion.usage: Temporarily boosts stamina regeneration and reaction time
Spice Infusion.how_to_obtain: Unlocked via the Mentat perk path and crafted with refined spice

Spice Sampler.usage: Used to collect spice samples for refining

Stillsuits.usage: Crafted for desert survival, extracts water, captures and recycles body moisture, reducing water consumption while exploring
Stillsuits.how_to_obtain: Crafted, acquired early via tutorial quest; can be upgraded

Stilltent.usage: Equip to deploy a temporary shelter, regain moisture

Stravidium.usage: Controlled in PVP, found in Deep Desert

Terrarium of Muad’Dib.usage: Detailed decoration housing a desert mouse, Muad’Dib, depicting its life

Titanium.usage: Controlled in PVP, found in Deep Desert

Vehicles.research_required: Intel or schematic for vehicles category

Water Cisterns.crafting_materials: 80x Steel Ingot, 24x Watertube, 18x Mechanical Parts, 30x Polymers

Water Flask.usage: Replenishes the hydration meter and prevents dehydration debuffs
Water Flask.how_to_obtain: Crafted at a survival station or bought from neutral outposts

Welding Wire.usage: Welding material is required when using the welding torch to repair vehicle parts. Crafted from salvaged metal parts.

Windtrap.usage: Generates water over time when placed in a base or settlement area
Windtrap.how_to_obtain: Built at a base using harvested alloys and polymers
Windtrap.impact_on_progression: Essential for water generation in bases

Carrier Ornithopter Centrifuge Mk6.crafting_materials: 40x Plastanium Ingot, 15x Advanced Servoks, 15x Cobalt Paste, 10x Complex Machinery, 500x Water

Sandcrawler Chassis Mk5.crafting_materials: 60x Duraluminum Ingot, 30x Advanced Servoks, 25x Cobalt Paste, 10x Carbide Scraps, 680x Water

Sandcrawler Chassis Mk6.crafting_materials: 75x Plastanium Ingot, 40x Advanced Servoks, 35x Cobalt Paste, 15x Carbide Scraps, 1000x Water

Sandcrawler Cabin Mk5.crafting_materials: 50x Duraluminum Ingot, 20x Advanced Servoks, 20x Cobalt Paste, 30x Armor Plating, 500x Water

Sandcrawler Cabin Mk6.crafting_materials: 65x Plastanium Ingot, 30x Advanced Servoks, 30x Cobalt Paste, 40x Plasteel Composite Armor Plating, 700x Water

Sandcrawler Engine Mk5.crafting_materials: 48x Duraluminum Ingot, 25x Cobalt Paste, 14x Particle Capacitor, 21x Complex Machinery, 7x Hydraulic Piston, 675x Water

Sandcrawler Engine Mk6.crafting_materials: 60x Plastanium Ingot, 35x Cobalt Paste, 20x Particle Capacitor, 30x Complex Machinery, 10x Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston, 900x Water

Sandcrawler PSU Mk5.crafting_materials: 50x Duraluminum Ingot, 20x Particle Capacitor, 25x Cobalt Paste, 7x Military Power Regulator, 675x Water

Sandcrawler PSU Mk6.crafting_materials: 65x Plastanium Ingot, 30x Particle Capacitor, 35x Cobalt Paste, 10x Overclocked Regulator, 900x Water

Sandcrawler Storage Mk5.crafting_materials: 60x Duraluminum Ingot, 20x Advanced Servoks, 25x Cobalt Paste, 34x Armor Plating, 10x Diamondine Dust, 680x Water

Sandcrawler Storage Mk6.crafting_materials: 75x Plastanium Ingot, 30x Advanced Servoks, 35x Cobalt Paste, 50x Plasteel Composite Armor Plating, 15x Diamondine Dust, 1000x Water

Sandcrawler Tread Mk5.crafting_materials: 12x Duraluminum Ingot, 7x Advanced Servoks, 6x Cobalt Paste, 3x Industrial Pump, 340x Water

Sandcrawler Tread Mk6.crafting_materials: 15x Plastanium Ingot, 10x Advanced Servoks, 9x Cobalt Paste, 4x Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump, 340x Water

Sandcrawler Vacuum Mk5.crafting_materials: 30x Duraluminum Ingot, 15x Advanced Servoks, 15x Cobalt Paste, 10x Industrial Pump, 500x Water

Sandcrawler Vacuum Mk6.crafting_materials: 40x Plastanium Ingot, 20x Advanced Servoks, 20x Cobalt Paste, 15x Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump, 700x Water

Sandcrawler Centrifuge Mk5.crafting_materials: 30x Duraluminum Ingot, 15x Advanced Servoks, 15x Cobalt Paste, 10x Complex Machinery, 500x Water

Sandcrawler Centrifuge Mk6.crafting_materials: 40x Plastanium Ingot, 20x Advanced Servoks, 20x Cobalt Paste, 15x Complex Machinery, 700x Water

Dampened Sandcrawler Treads.usage: Dampened treads for Sandcrawler, reduces vibration to avoid sandworms
Dampened Sandcrawler Treads.crafting_materials: 15x Plastanium Ingot, 10x Advanced Servoks, 9x Cobalt Paste, 4x Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump, 340x Water

Upgraded Regis Spice Container.usage: Upgraded storage for Sandcrawler, increased capacity for spice
Upgraded Regis Spice Container.crafting_materials: 75x Plastanium Ingot, 30x Advanced Servoks, 35x Cobalt Paste, 50x Plasteel Composite Armor Plating, 15x Diamondine Dust, 1000x Water

Walker Sandcrawler Engine Mk6.usage: Walker engine for Sandcrawler, lower acceleration but higher top speed
Walker Sandcrawler Engine Mk6.crafting_materials: 60x Plastanium Ingot, 35x Cobalt Paste, 20x Particle Capacitor, 30x Complex Machinery, 10x Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston, 900x Water

Refinery Station.usage: Refines raw resources and Spice into refined materials (e.g., Ingots, Fuel Cells, Refined Spice).
Refinery Station.crafting_materials: 120x Steel Ingot, 45x Mechanical Parts, 25x Polymers, 6x Hydraulic Piston

Vehicle Fabricator.usage: Fabricates vehicle parts and modules for Sandbikes, Buggies, Ornithopters, and Sandcrawlers.
Vehicle Fabricator.crafting_materials: 150x Steel Ingot, 60x Mechanical Parts, 40x Polymers, 8x Hydraulic Piston

Advanced Survival Fabricator.usage: Produces advanced survival components (filters, servoks, regulators) and high-tier crafting items.
Advanced Survival Fabricator.crafting_materials: 100x Steel Ingot, 30x Mechanical Parts, 40x Polymers, 6x Servoks

Survival Station.usage: Entry-level bench for consumables and basic survival gear (e.g., Water Flasks).

Shelters (T1).usage: Basic survival structure for protection from storms and heat.

Fortresses (T2).usage: Heavily reinforced stronghold; increases defense and base durability.
Fortresses (T2).crafting_materials: 320x Granite Stone, 120x Steel Ingot, 40x Polymers, 12x Armor Plating

Water Cisterns (T1).usage: Automates storage of water from Windtraps and other inputs; prevents overflow.
Water Cisterns (T1).crafting_materials: 80x Steel Ingot, 24x Watertube, 18x Mechanical Parts, 30x Polymers

Building Piece - Floor.usage: Floor structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Wall.usage: Wall structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Ceiling.usage: Ceiling structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Foundation.usage: Foundation structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Pillar.usage: Pillar structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Door.usage: Door structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Window.usage: Window structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Stairs.usage: Stairs structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Ramp.usage: Ramp structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Roof.usage: Roof structural element for base construction.

Building Piece - Gate.usage: Gate structural element for base construction.

Sandbike.description: Single-person speeder used for quickly navigating the arid wastes. Low storage and carry-size, made up for in sheer speed, being the fastest and most agile of all land-based vehicles. Can be modified with a backseat to allow an additional player, sacrificing other rear attachments like booster or storage.

crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk1 (Copper): Copper Ingot, Advanced Servoks, Particle Capacitor
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk2 (Iron): Iron Ingot, Advanced Servoks, Particle Capacitor, Holtzman Actuator, Armor Plating, Spice-infused Iron Dust
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk3 (Steel): Water, Steel Ingot, Cobalt Paste, Particle Capacitor, Complex Machinery, Advanced Servoks, Armor Plating, Spice-infused Steel Dust
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk4 (Aluminum): Water, Aluminum Ingot, Cobalt Paste, Particle Capacitor, Complex Machinery, Advanced Servoks, Carbide Scraps, Armor Plating, Diamondine Dust
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk5 (Duraluminum): Water, Duraluminum Ingot, Cobalt Paste, Particle Capacitor, Complex Machinery, Advanced Servoks, Hydraulic Piston, Armor Plating, Military Power Regulator, Carbide Scraps, Diamondine Dust
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk6 (Plastanium): Water, Plastanium Ingot, Cobalt Paste, Particle Capacitor, Complex Machinery, Advanced Servoks, Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston, Plasteel Composite Armor Plating, Overclocked Regulator, Spice Melange, Carbide Scraps, Diamondine Dust

Sandbike.research_required: Schematics for Mk3 and above require Intel Points (e.g., Mk3 costs 10 Intel Points, Mk6 costs 40 Intel Points) and Intel Spent thresholds (e.g., Mk4 requires 300 Intel Spent, Mk5 requires 700, Mk6 requires 1,200). Mk1 and Mk2 have no explicit Intel cost.
Sandbike.how_to_obtain_blueprints: Unlocked through the Research Menu using Intel Points for Schematic Kits (e.g., Mk1 Sandbike Assembly unlocks all Mk1 components). Learning some schematics requires being next to a Fabricator in your base.
Sandbike.usage: Primarily for exploration and traversal, first unlockable vehicle for solo medium-distance travel.
Sandbike.customization: Can modify with backseat, booster, or storage, but adding a backseat sacrifices other rear attachments.
Sandbike.stats: High speed and agility, low storage and carry-capacity.

Buggy.description: Ground vehicle for mining and transport, can be equipped with cutteray for resource gathering. Slow but high capacity. Requires 4 tracks.

crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk3 (Steel): 45 ml Water, 5 Steel Ingots per track (x4 tracks), similar for other parts

Buggy.research_required: Unlocked in mid-to-late game by reaching Steel Tier and spending Intel Points. High-tier requires Advanced Vehicle Fabricator.
Buggy.how_to_obtain_blueprints: Unlock Buggy bundle with 15 Intel Points.
Buggy.usage: Mass produce for mining, increases ore gathering.
Buggy.stats: Super slow, high storage capacity (1500 units vs Sandbike 250).

Scout Ornithopter.description: Light Ornithopter, lightest and smallest flying vehicle on Arrakis, adept at ferrying one individual across great distances. Lacks offensive weaponry, mediocre armor, quick to evade opponents.

crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk4 (Aluminum): Aluminum Ingot x241, Advanced Servoks x46, Cobalt Paste x68, Carbide Scraps x7, Particle Capacitor x22, Complex Machinery x8, Armor Plating x22, Diamondine Dust x14, Industrial Pump x8, Water 2696mL
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk5 (Duraluminum): Duraluminum Ingot x350, Advanced Servoks x140, Cobalt Paste x150, Carbide Scraps x20, Particle Capacitor x88, Complex Machinery x42, Armor Plating x68, Diamondine Dust x20, Industrial Pump x12, Hydraulic Piston x7, Military Power Regulator x7, Water 4050mL
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk6 (Plastanium): Plastanium Ingot x450, Advanced Servoks x180, Cobalt Paste x200, Carbide Scraps x30, Particle Capacitor x110, Complex Machinery x60, Plasteel Composite Armor Plating x100, Diamondine Dust x30, Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump x16, Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston x10, Overclocked Regulator x10, Spice Melange x40, Water 5400mL

Scout Ornithopter.research_required: Unlocked in mid-game, higher tiers require plastanium and Advanced Fabricator. Requires 20 Intel Points for Mk4 (Intel Spent: 300), 30 for Mk5 (700), 40 for Mk6 (1200).
Scout Ornithopter.how_to_obtain_blueprints: Progress through storyline or Intel Points in Research Menu. Loot Tier 4 and Tier 5 camp chests for parts.
Scout Ornithopter.usage: Mid- to late-game unlock, allows solo travel over lengthy vertical and horizontal distances, virtually no threat from sandworms or NPCs like Sardaukar patrols. No additional seating, risky for extra players to ride on top.
Scout Ornithopter.customization: Mix components across tiers except wings. Optional upgrades for storage or boosters, or weapons for combat.
Scout Ornithopter.stats: Unmatched speed and agility, mediocre armor, can glide in Vulture mode at higher speeds.

Assault Ornithopter.description: Medium Ornithopter, moderately-sized craft, not as fast as Scout but incredibly agile with higher armor values. Can be outfitted with various weapons and tools for aerial combat.

crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk5 (Duraluminum): Duraluminum Ingot x500, Advanced Servoks x200, Cobalt Paste x200, Carbide Scraps x30, Particle Capacitor x120, Complex Machinery x60, Armor Plating x100, Diamondine Dust x30, Industrial Pump x18, Hydraulic Piston x10, Military Power Regulator x10, Water 5400mL
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk6 (Plastanium): Plastanium Ingot x600, Advanced Servoks x240, Cobalt Paste x250, Carbide Scraps x45, Particle Capacitor x150, Complex Machinery x90, Plasteel Composite Armor Plating x150, Diamondine Dust x45, Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump x24, Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston x15, Overclocked Regulator x15, Spice Melange x60, Water 6750mL

Assault Ornithopter.research_required: Unlocked in late-game, requires Duraluminum/Plastanium and Advanced Fabricator. 30 Intel Points for Mk5 (Intel Spent: 700), 40 for Mk6 (1200).
Assault Ornithopter.how_to_obtain_blueprints: Progress through storyline or Intel Points. Loot Tier 5 zones for assault parts.
Assault Ornithopter.usage: Used for combat, equipped with rocket launchers, useful in PvP, especially in Deep Desert PvP zones. Slower than Scout Ornithopter but better armored.
Assault Ornithopter.customization: Mix components across tiers except wings. Outfitted with weapons for aerial combat.
Assault Ornithopter.stats: Agile with higher armor, rocket pod dmg: Mk6 391.

Carrier Ornithopter.description: Carry-All, massive air vehicle used to haul large groups and shipments across vast distances. Slowest of all Ornithopters, sports tough armor plating to protect cargo.

crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk6 (Plastanium): Plastanium Ingot x800, Advanced Servoks x300, Cobalt Paste x300, Particle Capacitor x200, Complex Machinery x150, Plasteel Composite Armor Plating x200, Diamondine Dust x60, Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump x30, Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston x20, Overclocked Regulator x20, Spice Melange x80, Water 9000mL

Carrier Ornithopter.research_required: Significant progress to unlock, late-game, 40 Intel Points (Intel Spent: 1200), requires Advanced Fabricator.
Carrier Ornithopter.how_to_obtain_blueprints: Progress through storyline or Intel Points.
Carrier Ornithopter.usage: Built for gathering and transporting massive quantities of resources, protecting from environmental hazards. Large, bulky, and slow, used for resource procurement.
Carrier Ornithopter.customization: Mix components, focus on storage and utility for hauling.
Carrier Ornithopter.stats: Slowest ornithopter, highest armor and cargo capacity.

Sandcrawler.description: One-person spice collector, heavy-duty land vehicle specializing in Spice Sand collection. Cumbersome, well-armored, capable of picking up and transporting great quantities of Spice Sand, has the most storage capacity out of all vehicles.

crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk5 (Duraluminum): Duraluminum Ingot x400, Advanced Servoks x150, Cobalt Paste x150, Carbide Scraps x25, Particle Capacitor x100, Complex Machinery x50, Armor Plating x80, Diamondine Dust x25, Industrial Pump x15, Hydraulic Piston x8, Military Power Regulator x8, Water 4500mL
crafting_materials_by_tier.Mk6 (Plastanium): Plastanium Ingot x500, Advanced Servoks x200, Cobalt Paste x200, Carbide Scraps x35, Particle Capacitor x130, Complex Machinery x70, Plasteel Composite Armor Plating x120, Diamondine Dust x35, Fluid Efficient Industrial Pump x20, Tri-Forged Hydraulic Piston x12, Overclocked Regulator x12, Spice Melange x50, Water 6000mL

Sandcrawler.research_required: Significant progress through the Research Menu to unlock, late- and end-game, 30 Intel Points for Mk5 (Intel Spent: 700), 40 for Mk6 (1200).
Sandcrawler.how_to_obtain_blueprints: Unlock through Research Menu with Intel Points.
Sandcrawler.usage: Built for procuring and transporting massive quantities of resources, protecting the driver from environmental hazards. Used in dangerous areas for scavenging or harvesting, slowest and bulkiest.
Sandcrawler.customization: Unique modules: Dampened Sandcrawler Treads (lower vibration), Upgraded Regis Spice Container (expanded storage), Walker Sandcrawler Engine Mk6 (lower acceleration, higher top speed).
Sandcrawler.stats: Slowest vehicle, highest storage capacity, well-armored.

Swordmaster.description: Elite melee combatants with defensive skills, trained in the Ginaz style.
Swordmaster.starting_ability: Deflection - Enter a defensive stance to deflect attacks.

specializations.The Will: Focuses on resilience and defensive tactics.
specializations.The Way: Increases healing, stamina, and buffs allies.

Swordmaster.playstyle: Tactical fight selection, focusing on close-quarters combat with defensive capabilities.
Swordmaster.strengths: High melee damage output, easy to learn, effective blocking of projectiles.
Swordmaster.other_details: Recommended as the best starting class for most players due to accessibility and depth; The Blade sub-class is most effective for beginners.

Mentat.description: Human computers with superhuman data processing capabilities.
Mentat.starting_ability: The Sentinel - Deploy a motion-detecting dart projector.

specializations.Mental Calculus: Enhances damage and reduced durability loss.

Mentat.playstyle: Requires planning and patience, focusing on scouting and sniping.
Mentat.strengths: Effective at range, tactical equipment deployment.
Mentat.weaknesses: Avoids close combat, requires strategic placement of traps.
Mentat.other_details: Mental Calculus path provides utility for solo play and group support.

Bene Gesserit.description: A powerful sisterhood skilled in subterfuge and manipulation.
Bene Gesserit.starting_ability: Compel - Influence enemies' actions through psychological means.

specializations.The Voice: Masters persuasive techniques to control others.
specializations.Weirding Way: Improves melee damage and movement abilities.

Bene Gesserit.playstyle: Hard learning curve, powerful when mastered, focuses on controlling enemies and mobility.
Bene Gesserit.strengths: Manipulation abilities, mobility (e.g., Bindu Sprint), effective in both PvE and PvP.
Bene Gesserit.other_details: Recommended as the next best option after Swordmaster for mobility.

Trooper.description: Trained soldiers from the Landsraad's Great Houses.
Trooper.starting_ability: Shigawire Claw - Utilize specialized equipment for combat scenarios (grapple or stagger enemies).

specializations.Gunnery: Focuses on weapon damage and repair.

Trooper.playstyle: Beginner-friendly, versatile options, focuses on mid-range combat.
Trooper.strengths: Balanced combat with good defensive capabilities, versatile tool (Shigawire Claw) for mobility and offense.
Trooper.other_details: Trainer encountered early, skill tree unlockable within first few hours; Gunnery path provides reliable damage output.

Planetologist.description: Experts in ecology and Arrakis' harsh terrain.

specializations.The Surveyor: Excels in terrain analysis and mapping.
specializations.The Ecologist: Focuses on studying and interacting with ecosystems.

Planetologist.how_to_unlock: Unlockable through progression. Progress through the main storyline, complete the 'The Voice from the Desert' quest.

Atreides.description: Noble house known for honor and justice.
Atreides.how_to_join: Align during character creation or in-game.

Harkonnen.description: Ruthless house focused on power and control.
Harkonnen.how_to_join: Align during character creation or in-game.

Bene Gesserit.how_to_join: Align during character creation or in-game.

Fremen.description: Native desert warriors, vanished but lore-important.
Fremen.other_details: Mystery of disappearance central to story.

Deflection.description: Enter a defensive stance to deflect attacks.

Compel.description: Influence enemies' actions through psychological means.

Shigawire Claw.description: Utilize specialized equipment for combat scenarios (grapple or stagger enemies).
